mapper.select: select id, plan_config_id, play_category_id, dict_pursue_scheme, stage_count_start, stage_count_end, stage_count, sort, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_pursue_scheme where id = #{id} limit 1

select id, plan_config_id, play_category_id, dict_pursue_scheme, stage_count_start, stage_count_end, stage_count, sort, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_pursue_scheme where plan_config_id = #{planConfigId}
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_pursue_scheme(plan_config_id, play_category_id, dict_pursue_scheme, stage_count_start, stage_count_end, stage_count, sort, create_time, update_time) values (#{planConfigId}, #{playCategoryId}, #{dictPursueScheme}, #{stageCountStart}, #{stageCountEnd}, #{stageCount}, #{sort}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_pursue_scheme
plan_config_id = #{planConfigId},
play_category_id = #{playCategoryId},
dict_pursue_scheme = #{dictPursueScheme},
stage_count_start = #{stageCountStart},
stage_count_end = #{stageCountEnd},
stage_count = #{stageCount},
sort = #{sort},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_pursue_scheme where id in (${ids})
